overview: Léna, Lucas, Eléna, Bas and Connor have known this from a young age: they were not born with the right sex in the right body. Between family rejection and medical wandering, their journey reveals their struggle to find a way out of their discomfort. Filmed in their daily lives, Lucas, Elena, Léna, Bas and Connor invite you to take a new look at the construction of male and female identity.
title: Devenir il ou elle
